parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: ExecuteCost
parameters.description: The execution duration of the SQL statement. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: ExecuteState
parameters.description:
The execution status of the SQL statement.

*   **1**: successful.
*   **0**: failed.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the file that contains the query diagnostic information. Valid values:

*   **zh**: simplified Chinese.
*   **en**: English.
*   **ja**: Japanese.
*   **zh-tw**: traditional Chinese.

parameters.name: MaxExecuteCost
parameters.description: The maximum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 0.

parameters.name: MinExecuteCost
parameters.description: The minimum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 0.

parameters.name: OperationClass
parameters.description: The type of the query language. Example: DQL, DML, or DDL.

parameters.name: OperationType
parameters.description: The type of the SQL statement. Example: SELECT.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description: The keywords that are used for query.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the database account.
